briefTitle: Study To Confirm Efficacy and Safety of Terlipressin in Hepatorenal Syndrome (HRS) Type 1
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Double-Blind Study to Confirm Efficacy and Safety of Terlipressin in Subjects With Hepatorenal Syndrome Type 1 (The CONFIRM Study)
summary:
This study is to treat adult patients with hepatorenal syndrome (HRS) Type 1.

Out of every three participants, two will receive terlipressin and one will receive placebo.

Assignments will be made randomly.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Verified HRS Reversal
